MultiFeature.Name: Mind Vault
MultiFeature.Text: Your mind forms a light but useful link to other living things within hundreds of miles. This link allows you to draw on the knowledge of others in the following ways.

Feature.Name: Mind Vault - Psychic Focus
Feature.Text: While focused on this discipline, you gain proficiency with one skill, weapon, shield, armor, or tool of your choice. Each time you focus on this discipline, you can choose a different skill, weapon, shield, armor, or tool.

Feature.Name: Mind Vault - Borrow Expertise (2)
Feature.Text: As a bonus action, you gain advantage on one skill check or saving throw of your choice that you make before the end of your next turn. You must opt to gain the advantage before rolling.

Feature.Name: Mind Vault - Borrow Language (5)
Feature.Text: As an action, you gain the ability to speak, read, and understand one language for 8 hours. You can use this ability multiple times to gain its benefits with several languages.

Feature.Name: Mind Vault - Borrow Lore (7)
Feature.Text: As an action, name one specific location in your mind. You learn a summary of the important lore regarding that place. At the DMâ€™s option, you also learn up to three secrets about it, such as the location of traps, passwords, or where treasure is hidden within it.

MultiFeature.Source: Unearthed Arcana 6 - Psionics and the Mystic, Take 2
